DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine whether spironolactone are effective in the reduction of albuminuria and diastolic disfunction of subjects with diabetic nephropathy.
DOC.criteria: Diabetic subjects with maximum ten years after diagnostic Diabetic nephropathy with albuminuria Normal renal function Diastolic disfunction Taking a IECA or ARA drug family previously Diabetics subjects with macroangiopathy Acute coronary syndrome in the three months before Hyperkalemia > 5.5 mEq/L Pregnancy
